p: According to the ISRI ( 2003), the TVC for chicken burger is proposed 6 log CFU/g. In this study, control treatment had a allowed limit up to 4 days and chitosan up to 6 days, chitosan + essential oil 0.5% to 8 days, chitosan + essential oil 1% to 9 days, chitosan + essential oil 1%, chitosan + essential oil, 1.5% to 11 days and chitosan + essential oil 2% up to the end of the maintenance period.
